alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 2:10PM MST until December 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 to 5 inches, especially in the higher elevations of the Cache Valley. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Periodic road snow and slush will result in difficult travel, especially during the overnight and early morning hours. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will transition to rain Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County
